Class ContactsManager

java.lang.Object
ContactsManager
public class ContactsManager extends Object
A class responsible for managing contacts. It provides methods to create, update, delete, and read contacts.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static Console
    c
    The console object for reading user input.
    private static ArrayList<Person>
    contacts
    The ArrayList for storing the contacts.

  • Constructor Details

    • ContactsManager

      public ContactsManager()

  • Method Details

    • createNewContact

      public static void createNewContact()
      Creates a new contact by creating a new Person object. Sets the social security number of the contact and then invokes a second method to set the rest of the details.

    • updateContact

      public static void updateContact(Person person)
      Is used in updating the specified contact by providing a menu to modify a chosen detail or all details of the contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updateFirstName

      public static void updateFirstName(Person person)
      Updates the first name of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updateLastName

      public static void updateLastName(Person person)
      Updates the last name of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updatePhoneNumber

      public static void updatePhoneNumber(Person person)
      Updates the phone number of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updateAddress

      public static void updateAddress(Person person)
      Updates the address of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updateEmailAddress

      public static void updateEmailAddress(Person person)
      Updates the email address of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • updateAllInformation

      public static void updateAllInformation(Person person)
      Updates all details except the social security number of the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      person - The contact to be updated.

    • deleteContacts

      public static void deleteContacts()
      Deletes specific contact or all contacts based on user input.

    • readContacts

      public static void readContacts()
      Reads and displays all contacts that are stored in the contacts ArrayList.

    • checkForSsn

      public static Person checkForSsn()
      Asks for a social security number via the console and then checks if it can find a contact that has that.
      Returns:
      The contact if found, otherwise null.

    • getContacts

      public static ArrayList<Person> getContacts()
      Gets the ArrayList of contacts.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of contacts.

    • getContactsSize

      public static int getContactsSize()
      Gets the number of contacts in the contacts ArrayList.
      Returns:
      The number of contacts.
